Revamped my resume and LinkedIn profile

Jan 17, 2017

I've been reading that book on nailing the PM interview and have been picking up ways to improve my resume. I decided to completely redesign the layout, rewrite the copy and I added a references section.

I also met with my mentor, Seda, today at BunkerLabs and told her about my ambition to land a job as a Product Manager. She gave me a lot of great advice and told me that in addition to redoing my resume that I needed to update my LinkedIn. So I did.

I'm ready to start applying for PM positions and have already started writing cover letters. Lets go!
